feed.title: GitHub Perl Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Perl in GitHub

entry.title: renatocron/Pendant
entry.summary:
A git based wiki

  • Synopsis Pendant is a git/plack-based wiki
  • Running

#+begin_src sh dzil authordeps | cpanm dzil listdeps | cpanm plackup -Ilib #+end_src

Visit http://localhost:5000/README

entry.title: mauke/Acme-Lvalue
entry.summary:
Acme-Lvalue

Generalized lvalue subroutines.

INSTALLATION

To install this module, run the following commands:

perl Makefile.PL
make
make test
make install

SUPPORT AND DOCUMENTATION

After installing, you can find documentation for this module with the perldoc command.

perldoc Acme::Lvalue

You can also look for information at:

RT, CPAN's request tracker (report bugs here)
    http://rt.cpan.org/NoAuth/Bugs.html?Dist=Acme-Lvalue

AnnoCPAN, Annotated CPAN documentation
    http://annocpan.org/dist/Acme-Lvalue

CPAN Ratings
    http://cpanratings.perl.org/d/Acme-Lvalue

Search CPAN
    http://search.cpan.org/dist/Acme-Lvalue/

LICENSE AND COPYRIGHT
